TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ConfigurationProperty extends System.Object

summary.span: Represents an attribute or a child of a configuration element.

span.span: Represents an attribute or a child of a configuration element.

summary.span: This class cannot be inherited.

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在簡單的情況下，這類`CustomSection`的下一個範例所示物件代表屬性例如`fileName`。In the case of a simple , such as the `CustomSection` shown in the next example, the objects represent attributes such as `fileName`. 如果是更複雜的組態項目，例如包含小節中，執行個體的區段`authentication`，則物件可以代表物件以及屬性。In the case of more complex configuration elements such as a section containing subsections, for instance `authentication`, the objects can represent objects as well as attributes. 類別表示的集合可以是任一屬性的物件或組態項目的物件。The class represents the collection of the objects that can be either attributes or objects of a configuration element. 類別代表個別的組態設定。The class represents an individual configuration setting. 這個類別可讓您取得或設定名稱、 類型和特定組態實體 （屬性或元素） 的預設值，並指定屬性是必要、 項目索引鍵，或代表預設項目集合。This class allows you to get or set the name, type, and default value for a particular configuration entity (attribute or element) and specify whether the attribute is required, is an element key, or represents a default element collection. ## Examples 1. 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用當您建立自訂的區段。The following code example shows how to use the when you create a custom section. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty/CS/ConfigurationProperty.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty/VB/ConfigurationProperty.vb#1)] 以下是摘錄自上一個範例中的程式碼所使用的組態檔。The following is an excerpt of the configuration file used by the code in the previous example. 下列範例示範如何建立程式碼中的上一節。The following example shows how to create the previous section in code. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty#30](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty/CS/ConfigurationProperty.cs#30)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty#30](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty/VB/ConfigurationProperty.vb#30)]

span.para: 每隔物件會建立內部的集合物件，表示項目屬性或子項目的集合。包含非自訂的資訊和功能所提供的物件屬性。您可以使用程式設計方式或宣告式 (attributed) 程式撰寫模型來建立自訂的組態項目。 程式設計模型。此模型，您必須建立每個項目屬性來取得及/或將其值設定，並將它新增至基礎的內部屬性包屬性基底類別。 宣告式模型。這個簡單的模型，也稱為屬性化的模型，可讓您使用屬性來定義元素屬性來裝飾屬性。這些屬性會指示 ASP.NET 組態系統有關的屬性類型和其預設值。利用此資訊，透過反映取得 ASP.NET 組態系統會為您建立的項目屬性的物件，並執行必要的初始化。

Every object creates an internal collection of objects that represents either the element attributes or a collection of child elements. Non-customizable information and functionality is contained by an object provided by the property. You can use a programmatic or a declarative (attributed) coding model to create a custom configuration element. - Programmatic Model. This model requires that you create a property for each element attribute to get and/or set its value and add it to the internal property bag of the underlying base class. - Declarative Model. This simpler model, also called attributed model, allows you to define an element attribute by using a property and decorate it with attributes. These attributes instruct the ASP.NET configuration system about the property types and their default values. With this information, obtained through reflection, the ASP.NET configuration system creates the element property objects for you and performs the required initialization.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您要建立的組態屬性[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]或更新版本，並不應該將屬性值序列化為 XML，舊版 framework 為目標時，如果將此屬性設定為`true`。If you are creating a configuration property for the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] or later versions, and if the property value should not be serialized to XML when an earlier version of the framework is targeted, set this property to `true`. 您使用來設定這個屬性，當您呼叫的建構函式，其中包含參數。You use to set this property when you call a constructor that includes a parameter.
